snippet: The Senate voted, 54 to 46, in a straight party-line vote, to table a measure favored by House Republicans to negotiate further over curtailing elements of the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: The Senate voted, 54 to 46, in a straight party-line vote, to table a measure favored by House Republicans to negotiate further over curtailing elements of the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Senate Rejects House Offer to Negotiate
